projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive personal portfolio website featuring animated backgrounds, project filtering, and integrated contact/social links.

projects.title: Brand Hub
projects.description: A dynamic web application for exploring brands, with real-time search, category filtering, user authentication, and Firebase integration.

projects.title: Stock Dashboard
projects.description: A web platform with a real-time stock market dashboard of top companies and a service portal connecting skilled workers with clients.

projects.title: Midnight Drip
projects.description: A modern, responsive landing page for a fictional premium coffee brand, showcasing products information.

projects.title: Spam Detection Python Scripts
projects.description: A collection of Python scripts and datasets for SMS spam detection using machine learning and natural language processing.

projects.title: Car
projects.description: A modern, responsive landing page for a fictional car brand, highlighting features and design.

projects.title: Python Interactive Scripts
projects.description: A collection of interactive Python scripts and projects, including sorting algorithms, games, and algorithm visualizations.
